s: But I needed a new cover anyway. I've purchased 3 or 4 of these beds for my dogs, and these are the best dog beds out there! My Burmese Mountain Dog and my Great White Pyrenees won't lay on the other beds so I threw them out. I will only purchase from Floppy Dog for dog beds, and such.
